BIO

A combination of formal education and comprehensive hands-on experience as IT supporting staff & supervisor, Web & Graphic Designer and Marketing Communication Executive will make an excellent addition to your organisation.

Cempedak Private Island - Bintan

2017 - 2018 | IT Supervisor

My main job in this resort are build the network topology for new villas and maintenance the network for smooth operations

Turi Beach Resort (Nongsa Resorts) - Batam

2014 - 2017 | Web Administrator & Graphic Designer

My main job in here are doing collateral design, maintenance the resort website and do some photography for raw material design

Favehotel M.T Haryono - Balikpapan

2013 - 2014 | Marketing & Sales Executive and Graphic Designer

My main job in here is actually do the marketing stuff, due to the hotel itself has the concept of budgeting hotel, so all the staff has know the multiskill to do a several job

Nagoya Mansion Hotel & Residence - Batam

2012 - 2013 | Marketing & Graphic Designer (Pre-Opening Team

As the pre-opening team, my main job in here do the preparation for the new hotel especially in Marketing and collateral design

Aston Jayapura Hotel & Convention Center - Jayapura

2010 - 2012 | Marketing & Graphic Designer (Pre-Opening Team)

As the pre-opening team, my main job in here do the preparation for the new hotel especially in Marketing and collateral design

Pakuwon Golf & Family Club - Surabaya

2006 - 2009 | Public Area Attendant

During my college, i have do some of dailyworker job to get additional fund for my study
